hits.definition:
完

[wán] finished, complete

区 (F 區)

[qū] (= 地区 dìqū) area; 区别 qùbié difference

[ōu] <family name>

即

[jí] namely, that is, even if, (= 立即 lìjí) immediately, at once

品

[pǐn] (= 产品 chǎnpǐn) product; 商品 shāngpǐn merchandise, goods

转 (F 轉)

[zhuǎn] turn, transfer

[zhuàn] rotate

[zhuǎi] 转文 zhuǎiwén to flaunt one's speach

量

[liàng] amount;

    量词 liàngcí classifier, measure word

[liáng] to measure

空

[kōng] empty, sky

[kòng] leave empty, free time

甚

[shèn] very;

    甚至 shènzhì even, go so far as to

[shén] (= 什 shén) what?; 甚么 = 什么 shénme what?

轻 (F 輕)

[qīng] light (compare with 重 zhòng heavy)

告

[gào] (= 告诉 gàosu) tell;

报告 bàogào report, make known

[gù] 告朔 gùshuò distributing feudal calendar
